Name: Shabti belonging to Nesykhons
Description: Shabti belonging to Nesykhons, Great Mistress of the Concubines of the Harem of Amun. The agricultural equipment and the inscription are painted in black, the latter in five horizontal lines all around the body, containing Chapter VI of the Book of the Dead. This lady was the wife of the First Prophet of Amun, Pinudjem II.
